text: Answer: (d) Solution: Table of XY flip flop o | [0 [ [comenent_| (1[0 Jeompimen| Now 2 Je 5 [ [on] ] N E I L[ Jo Jr o | =26 Quandy - Q] So as we can see from the above table of XY flipflop that when input (z) is 1 it toggle its state and when z is 0 it have previous state which match with the working of T flipflop.
